EmailTemplate.name: Wine Tumbler Price
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
We appreciate you reaching out. This was our error – we mistakenly listed the Wine Tumbler below our intended price of $24.99. Sorry for any confusion. We’re really excited about this product. Like all our YETI products, this Wine Tumbler is built to be the toughest, most durable product out there. We know you’re really going to love it.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
